trans-unit.source: Represents the transactional environment of the workflow instance that is running on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Representa o ambiente de transações da instância do fluxo de trabalho que está em execução no thread atual.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The WorkflowEnvironment represents the transactional environment of the workflow instance that is running on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O WorkflowEnvironment representa o ambiente de transações da instância do fluxo de trabalho que está em execução no thread atual.

trans-unit.source: WorkflowEnvironment has two properties: the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> property, which exposes the current work batch and allows a host or a host service to participate in the current transaction by adding <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> items to this property; and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property, which exposes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance currently running on this thread.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowEnvironment tem duas propriedades: o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>propriedade, que expõe o lote de trabalho atual e permite que um host ou um serviço de host para participar da transação atual, adicionando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>itens para essa propriedade; e o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A>propriedade, que expõe o <xref:System.Guid>da instância do fluxo de trabalho em execução no momento neste thread.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>
Obtém o lote de trabalho atual.

trans-unit.source: The WorkBatch property allows hosts or host services to participate in the current transaction by adding pending work items to the current work batch.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade WorkBatch permite que os hosts ou hospedar serviços para participar da transação atual, adicionando itens de trabalho pendentes para o lote de trabalho atual.

trans-unit.source: A host or a host service that wants to participate in the current transaction must implement the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface and use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to add pending work items to WorkBatch.
trans-unit.target: Um host ou um serviço de host que deseja participar na transação atual deve implementar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>de interface e usar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para adicionar itens de trabalho pendentes para WorkBatch.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>

trans-unit.source: Durable services should add items to WorkBatch to keep the state of their data stores consistent with the state of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Serviços duráveis devem adicionar itens à WorkBatch para manter o estado de seus repositórios de dados consistentes com o estado da instância do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The out-of-box durable services, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>, both implement this functionality.
trans-unit.target: Os serviços duráveis out-of-box, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>, ambos implementam essa funcionalidade.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch"></xref> that represents the current work batch.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.IWorkBatch"> </xref> que representa o lote de trabalho atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Guid>da instância do fluxo de trabalho associada ao segmento atual.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: WorkflowInstanceId contains the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance currently running in this thread.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowInstanceId contém o <xref:System.Guid>da instância do fluxo de trabalho em execução no momento neste thread.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Whenever code is run from within a workflow thread, you can get the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance through the WorkflowInstanceId property.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que o código for executado de dentro de um thread de fluxo de trabalho, você pode obter o <xref:System.Guid>da instância do fluxo de trabalho por meio da propriedade WorkflowInstanceId.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: For example, if your code is in a service called by an activity, WorkflowInstanceId will provide <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance for the calling activity.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o código está em um serviço chamado por uma atividade, WorkflowInstanceId fornecerá <xref:System.Guid>da instância do fluxo de trabalho para a atividade de chamada.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> that identifies the current workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>que identifica a instância de fluxo de trabalho atual.</xref:System.Guid>
